pr_title: Set a path on the invalidated cookie

timeline.bodyText: If you want the cookie to be invalidated, why don't you also reset the value?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Because to clear a cookie you set max age 0. The value has no effect in this case.
replies.author: stuartwdouglas

replies.bodyText: yes, I know. Just a bit useless to send the value over the wire IMHO.
replies.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Hi @gsmet @stuartwdouglas yes, I've seen it being suggested, for the moment I've just reused the code from Vertx and added a path, but I suppose I can set its value as empty. @lodrantl mentioned it is less obvious the cookie has been invalidated when tracing the network requests if the name remains
replies.author: sberyozkin
